```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Let's import a dataset

```{r}
litters_df =
  read.csv("data_import_examples/FAS_litters.csv")
```

Look at your data

```{r}
names(litters_df)
```
Updates the namens in litter_df

```{r}
litters_df =
  janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

Look at the data
```{r}
litters_df
```


Sometimes skimming data in neat?
```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df)
```



#Fix the missing data
We can skip=5
```{r}
litters_df = 
  read.csv("data_import_examples/FAS_litters.csv", na = c("NA", ".", ""))
```
#Import Pups data
```{r}
pups_df = 
  read.csv("data_import_examples/FAS_pups.csv",
           skip = 3,
           na = c("NA", ".", ""))
```
